media:group.media:title: Category Theory - Lecture 4 Part 2
media:group.media:description:
In this video define equivalence of categories and prove a recognition theorem for when a functor is part of an equivalence of categories. We end with a short discussion of representability in preparation for the next regular lecture.

At the end I recommend everyone reads 'When is one thing equal to some other thing?' by Barry Mazur: www.math.harvard.edu/~mazur/preprints/when_is_one.pdf
